com.centurylink.mdw.monitor

Interface ActivityMonitor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RegisteredService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivityTraceMonitor

    public interface ActivityMonitor
extends RegisteredService
    Activity monitors can be registered through @RegisteredService annotations to get called whenever an MDW workflow activity is invoked.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onError(ActivityRuntimeContext runtimeContext)
      Called when an activity instance fails due to error.
      java.lang.String onExecute(ActivityRuntimeContext runtimeContext)
      Non-null means bypass execution with the returned result code.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> onFinish(ActivityRuntimeContext runtimeContext)
      Called when an activity instance is successfully completed.
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> onStart(ActivityRuntimeContext runtimeContext)
      Called when an activity instance is to be started.

    • Method Detail

      • onStart

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> onStart(ActivityRuntimeContext runtimeContext)
        Called when an activity instance is to be started.
        Parameters:
        runtimeContext - the activity workflow context
        Returns:
        optional map containing new or updated process variable values TODO: return type void (variables should be passed and set in runtimeContext)

      • onExecute

        java.lang.String onExecute(ActivityRuntimeContext runtimeContext)
        Non-null means bypass execution with the returned result code.
        Returns:
        optional map with variable values to set in this activity's process.

      • onFinish

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> onFinish(ActivityRuntimeContext runtimeContext)
        Called when an activity instance is successfully completed.
        Returns:
        optional map with variable values to override in this activity's process.

      • onError

        void onError(ActivityRuntimeContext runtimeContext)
        Called when an activity instance fails due to error. TODO: make exception available
